description:
Trent, a 20 year old college student, is a baseball player and is studying business administration. He's a quiet guy, but once our video cameras started rolling, it was clear that he's anything but shy. He has been dating a girl on and off for about 6 months now, but he's wanting to find someone he can have a steady relationship with.
Trent's video includes 4 scenes: a living room scene, followed by a kitchen scene, a shower scene, and then his final scene is on the couch, where he works himself into pure solo ecstasy.
title: Trent
